criteria.name: decisions_evaluated
criteria.description: At least 1 decision evaluated with actual_outcome and accuracy_score

criteria.name: evidence_based_scoring
criteria.description: Each evaluation cites specific evidence for the accuracy score, not just a number

criteria.name: accuracy_trend_analyzed
criteria.description: Report includes system-wide accuracy trend analysis (improving, stable, degrading)

criteria.name: bias_detection
criteria.description: Report identifies at least 1 systematic bias or explicitly states none detected with evidence

criteria.name: improvement_recommendations
criteria.description: Report includes actionable recommendations for improving prediction quality

criteria.name: no_placeholders
criteria.description: No TODO, TBD, PLACEHOLDER, or template brackets in output
